meanings.definition: A person who exercises control or authority over others.
meanings.sent1: The bosses at the office make sure everyone follows the rules.
meanings.sent2: The new bosses were introduced to the team during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The bosses decided to have a pizza party for the staff to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the queen is the most powerful boss on the board.
meanings.sent5: The bosses' stern faces made it clear that they meant business.

meanings.sent1: She bosses her younger brother around when they play together.
meanings.sent2: The coach bosses the players to run faster during practice.
meanings.sent3: The cat bosses the dog by stealing its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The wind bosses the leaves around in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: He bosses the project team with clear instructions and deadlines.

meanings.definition: The top or head of something.
meanings.sent1: The bosses of the company meet every Monday to discuss strategy.
meanings.sent2: The mountain peak is the highest boss in the range.
meanings.sent3: The cake's cherry is the boss of all the delicious flavors.
meanings.sent4: The sun is the boss of the solar system, shining brightly for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The boss of the tree is its sturdy trunk, supporting all its branches.
